description:
Secure the Call is a charity that collects and converts as many old cell phones as possible into 911 emergency access phones. This is done on a national basis, with collections and distributions going on in most states.

Distributions are made through community partners who work directly with clients. For information about how you can become a community partner, visit securethecall.org/get-involved/.

###MON###
###COL###
name: SECURE THE CALL, INC.
